thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: EJ Bennett

author: EJ Bennett
title: EJ Bennett
text: Rented a car in the Dominican Republic from them, but when I got there the rental car company (Thrifty) told me I needed to pay an additional $75 for insurance I didn't need, almost doubling the cost of the rental. I called Rentalcars.com and got an email from them saying they'd reverse the charges. It's 2 months later and nothing has been done, despite my following up many times. Other sites give them terrible reviews, it's fishy that Trustpilot has so many glowing reviews of them. Never use them.
